questions.question: If SOFI shows 'Regime: Bear, Confidence: 56%, Status: Transition' and your threshold=70%, your sizing should be:
options: Zero or reduced to a token size
questions.explanation: Below-threshold confidence → no/low size until regime stabilizes.

questions.question: Assume WinProb=0.52, Win/Loss=1.2:1. Kelly f*=(bp−q)/b. Compute f*.
List two talking points to explain a HOLD decision to a client.
questions.answer_text: 1) Confidence below threshold; 2) Transition state increases uncertainty; we preserve capital until edge strengthens.
